additional_currencies.description: Additional currency information - can be used to receive additional information about invoice in another currency.

fx_rate.description: Foreign exchange rate used in calculation

billing_country_code.description: Billing two letter ISO country code.

buyer_credit_card_prefix.description: First 6 digits of buyer's credit card prefix.

buyer_ip.description: IP address of the buyer in dotted decimal (IPv4) or text format (IPv6).

buyer_name.description: Buyer's name - first name and last name or company name.

buyer_tax_number.description: Buyer's tax number - EU VAT number for example. If using EU VAT number, it is possible to provide country code in it (e.g. IE1234567X) or simply use billing_country_code field for that. In the first case, if billing_country_code value was provided, it will be overwritten with country code value extracted from VAT number - but only if the VAT has been verified properly.

buyer_tax_number_valid.description: If the buyer tax number has been provided and was validated successfully. Always true for domestic transactions (billing country same as merchant's country), tax number doesn't get validated in that case.

comments.description: Additional information about the transaction - for example if the evidence has been amended.

confirm_timestamp.description: Date and time of transaction confirmation.

countries.description: Map of countries calculated from evidence provided. This value is not stored and is available only upon tax calculation.

by_2003_rules.description: Used when merchant uses 2003 EU VAT rules.

callingCode.description: List of phone number calling codes.

tax_number_country_code.description: VAT number country code. Important for Greece.

tax_region.description: Tax region code - e.g. EU, US, NO, JP...

tax_supported.description: True if tax calculation supported for this country.

by_billing.description: Country detected by billing country code

tax_supported.description: True if tax calculation supported for this country.

create_timestamp.description: Date and time of transaction creation.

currency_code.description: Currency code for transaction - e.g. EUR.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields, stored as key-value pairs. This property is not processed and used mostly with Taxamo-built helpers.

custom_id.description: Custom identifier provided upon transaction creation.

customer_id.description: Free-form field for storing customer id.

deducted_tax_amount.description: How much tax has been deducted.

by_2003_rules.description: Used when merchant uses 2003 EU VAT rules.

evidence_value.description: Value provided as evidence - for example IP address.

resolved_country_code.description: Country code that was resolved using this evidence.

used.description: If the evidence was used to match the actual country.

by_billing.description: Country detected by billing country code

evidence_value.description: Value provided as evidence - for example IP address.

resolved_country_code.description: Country code that was resolved using this evidence.

used.description: If the evidence was used to match the actual country.

by_cc.description: Country detected by credit card number prefix

evidence_value.description: Value provided as evidence - for example IP address.

resolved_country_code.description: Country code that was resolved using this evidence.

used.description: If the evidence was used to match the actual country.

guessed_from_ip.description: Country guessed from IP due to lack of other evidence

evidence_value.description: Value provided as evidence - for example IP address.

resolved_country_code.description: Country code that was resolved using this evidence.

used.description: If the evidence was used to match the actual country.

other_commercially_relevant_info.description: Additional evidence held by the merchant. Can be used only with a private token.

evidence_value.description: Value provided as evidence - for example IP address.

resolved_country_code.description: Country code that was resolved using this evidence.

used.description: If the evidence was used to match the actual country.

self_declaration.description: Self declared country as evidence. Requires merchant setting to be active.

evidence_value.description: Value provided as evidence - for example IP address.

resolved_country_code.description: Country code that was resolved using this evidence.

used.description: If the evidence was used to match the actual country.

force_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. Use it to force country code for tax calculation.

fully_informative.description: Set to true if transaction has only informative lines.

address_detail.description: Address details - for example apartament number.

freeform_address.description: Freeform address. Use when structured data is not available. Will be used in SAF-MOSS file if other fields are not provided.

region.description: Region, for United States - state code - e.g. NJ.

invoice_image_url.description: Invoice image URL - provided by Taxamo.

kind.description: Transaction kind: eu-b2c, eu-b2b, domestic, untaxed

manual.description: Is the transaction created manually - using private token. In manual mode, it is the merchant who calculates tax country and validates evidence. If you need API to do that when accessing the API with private token, just skip the 'manual' flag or use false value there and provide customer's ip address through buyer_ip field. Manual mode is also used when using original_transaction_key field.

note.description: Additional note related to transaction state - for example if the transaction was created in a 'catch-all' mode or the VAT number re-check for subscriptions has failed.

order_date.description: Order date in yyyy-MM-dd format, in merchant's timezone. If provided by the API caller, no timezone conversion is performed. Default value is current date and time. When using public token, the default value is used.

original_transaction_key.description: Use data and evidence from original transaction. Tax will be re-calculated, but evidence won't be re-checked. This parameter is taken into account only when 'manual' flag is raised.

status.description: Transaction status: 'N' - new, 'C' - confirmed. Can use 'C' in store-transaction! with private-token to create confirmed transaction, otherwise 'N' is default status. Not applicable for update-transaction!.

tax_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. This code applies to detected/set country for transaction, but can be set using manual mode.

tax_data.description: Tax additional information - e.g. US sales tax exemption certificate data.

exempt_states.description: List of states where the certificate is valid.

purchaser_business_type_other_value.description: If business type is other, a short description must be provided.

single_purchase.description: Set to true if this certificate is valid for single purchase only.

tax_deducted.description: If the transaction is in a country supported by Taxamo, but the tax is not calculated due to merchant settings or EU B2B transaction for example.

tax_entity_name.description: To which entity is the tax due.

tax_number_service.description: Tax number service identifier - if available for a given region and the region is enabled.

tax_supported.description: Is tax calculation supported for a detected tax location?

test.description: Was this transaction created in test mode?

additional_currencies.description: Additional currency information - can be used to receive additional information about invoice in another currency.

fx_rate.description: Foreign exchange rate used in calculation

amount.description: Amount. Required if total amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields, stored as key-value pairs. This property is not processed and used mostly with Taxamo-built helpers.

custom_id.description: Custom id, provided by ecommerce software.

deducted_tax_amount.description: Deducted tax amount, calculated by taxmo.

deducted_tax_rate.description: Deducted tax rate, calculated by taxamo.

informative.description: If the line is provided for informative purposes. Such line must have :tax-rate and optionally :tax-name - if not, API validation will fail for this line.

product_code.description: Internal product code, used for invoicing for example.

product_tax_code.description: External product tax code for a line, for example TIC in US Sales tax.

refunded_tax_amount.description: Refunded tax amount, calculated by taxmo.

refunded_total_amount.description: Refunded total amount, calculated by taxmo.

supply_date.description: Date of supply in yyyy-MM-dd format.

tax_name.description: Tax name, calculated by taxamo.  Can be overwritten when informative field is true.

tax_rate.description: Tax rate, calculated by taxamo. Must be provided when informative field is true.

total_amount.description: Total amount. Required if amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.
